61 
62 //list of items of the same type
63 template<typename type, int n_items> class ListTemplate : public List {
64 public:
65  ListTemplate(Element * parent = 0) : List(parent){}
66  Element * at(size_t i){ return _items + i; }
67  size_t size() const { return n_items; }
68  type * at_item(size_t i){ return _items + i; }
69 private:
70  type _items[n_items];
71 };
